subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Chris Wood eagled the 18th hole to win the Qatar Masters in Doha for his first European Tour victory at 18-under-par 270, overtaking Sergio García and George Coetzee, who finished a shot back.
snippet: Chris Wood eagled the 18th hole to win the Qatar Masters in Doha for his first European Tour victory at 18-under-par 270, overtaking Sergio García and George Coetzee, who finished a shot back.
